name: MessagePublishedData

data.description: The binary data in the message.

messageId.description:
ID of this message, assigned by the server when the message is published.
 Guaranteed to be unique within the topic.

publishTime.description:
The time at which the message was published, populated by the server when
 it receives the `Publish` call.

orderingKey.description:
If non-empty, identifies related messages for which publish order should be
 respected.

subscription.description:
The resource name of the subscription for which this event was
 generated. The format of the value is
 `projects/{project-id}/subscriptions/{subscription-id}`.

description: The event data when a message is published to a topic.
